duties_responsibilities.duty: Cold calling, account management, presentation development, and closing deals.
Tracking all sales contacts, meetings, opportunities, proposals, and orders.
Selling equipment rental and services to potential customers.
Developing and executing an annual territory sales plan.
Partnering with operations and logistics teams for project execution.
Having a general understanding of power generators, diesel engines, electrical distribution equipment, HVAC equipment, and oil free air compressors.
